description:
Approximately nine months after the end of the war between Earth and Mars.
Inaho meets Slaine again at the detention facility.
Inaho spoke to Slaine, who refused to listen to his words.
"Why do birds fly?"

titles.title: EP24.5: Ame no Dansho -The Penultimate Truth-
EP24.5: Fragment of Rain -The Penultimate Truth-
EP24.5: 雨の断章 -The Penultimate Truth-
